title: SGC-Graded N28 baseball cards for sale - Comiskey, Keefe, etc.
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SGC-Graded N28 baseball cards for sale - Comiskey, Keefe, etc.
posts.post_content:
Selling off several N-cards to help fund some other purchases. Only listing these here briefly before moving to eBay.

Photos shown below of these N28 Allen & Ginter cards. All backs correspond exactly with the fronts (i.e. the Clarkson has some paper loss as pictured while the Caruthers does not). If you have any questions about fronts/backs, don't hesitate to ask. My scans are also not the greatest so if you need a better description of any particular card, just let me know.

I went for high-appeal cards with clean fronts so these look tremendous (to me). Several came to me slabbed so I cannot guarantee this but I do not see any creases to any of them.
[STRIKE]
Clarkson SGC 10[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]Comiskey SGC A[/STRIKE] - SOLD

Keefe SGC A - Incredibly clean front and back, only trimmed. No creases. ($175.00)

[STRIKE]Glasscock SGC 10 [/STRIKE]- SOLD

Mulvey SGC 10 - Gorgeous card that is crease free. Some paper loss on back but pretty clean. ($150.00)

[STRIKE]Caruthers SGC 10 [/STRIKE]- SOLD

I will also have some N29s, N162s, and N172s listed shortly.
